languages.text: {n}Астропат бледнеет.{/n} "Прошу прощения, Ваша Светлость! Это... прискорбная необходимость..."
{n}The Astropath grows pale.{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! It's a... regrettable necessity..."
languages.original_text: {n}Астропат бледнеет.{/n} "Прошу прощения, Ваша Светлость! Это... прискорбная необходимость..."

languages.text: {n}El Astrópata palidece.{/n} «¡Mis disculpas, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Es... lamentablemente necesario...».
languages.original_text: {n}The Astropath grows pale.{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! It's a... regrettable necessity..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Astrópata palidece.{/n} «¡Mis disculpas, mi{mf|lord|lady}! Es... lamentablemente necesario...».

languages.text: {n}感応通信官は青ざめる。{/n}「申し訳ありません、陛下！これは…遺憾ながら必要なことなのです…」
languages.original_text: {n}The Astropath grows pale.{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! It's a... regrettable necessity..."

traits.locale_text: {n}感応通信官は青ざめる。{/n}「申し訳ありません、陛下！これは…遺憾ながら必要なことなのです…」

languages.text: {n}星语者的脸色变得苍白。{/n}“抱歉，大人！是因为发生了……令人遗憾的事态……”
languages.original_text: {n}The Astropath grows pale.{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! It's a... regrettable necessity..."

traits.locale_text: {n}星语者的脸色变得苍白。{/n}“抱歉，大人！是因为发生了……令人遗憾的事态……”

languages.text: {n}Der Astropath wird bleich.{/n} "Verzeiht, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Es ist eine ... bedauerliche Notwendigkeit ..."
languages.original_text: {n}The Astropath grows pale.{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! It's a... regrettable necessity..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Astropath wird bleich.{/n} "Verzeiht, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Es ist eine ... bedauerliche Notwendigkeit ..."

languages.text: {n}L'astropathe blêmit.{/n} « Toutes nos excuses, Votre Seigneurie ! C'est une... regrettable nécessité... »
languages.original_text: {n}The Astropath grows pale.{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! It's a... regrettable necessity..."

languages.text: {n}Astropat'ın beti benzi atıyor.{/n} "Özürlerimi sunuyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Bu... Ne yazık ki gerekliydi..."
languages.original_text: {n}The Astropath grows pale.{/n} "Apologies, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! It's a... regrettable necessity..."
